about_the_game:
The reaper's garden lies in the hands of a gigantic statue modeled after him as if he had torn a piece of earth from the ground and lifted it up high where no one can reach it. In the garden, hundreds of graves rise out of the land in an utterly disorderly manner, with a multitude of rose bushes weaving an impassable web between them. At the end of the garden, there is a simple stone church on top of a rock. According to legends, whoever makes a sacrifice on its altar can cheat death...

This DLC contains 4 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
